CHAT.comment: AMERICAN INSURANCE ASSOCIATION, ET AL., Petitioners v. JOHN GARAMENDI, INSURANCE COMMISSIONER, STATE OF CALIFORNIA
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KENNETH S. GELLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF FRANK KAPLAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 11:08 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
